post.title: t-mobile customers in md: anyone else not able to connect to the internet?
post.content: i am on 3.5g and i am not able to connect to t-mobile's internet connection. i am currently at school(montgomery college germantown) and can not connect but my phone is telling me i am on 3.5g. what's going on? can anyone help? anyone else having this problem? it was working fine last night.
